snippet.title: GRAPPLE DOGS: COSMIC CANINES - RELEASE DATE TRAILER
snippet.description:
Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines will be released on PC (Steam), Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch on August 15th!

Medallion Games and Super Rare Originals are thrilled to announce that Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines, the highly anticipated sequel to the critically-acclaimed 2D action-platformer Grapple Dog, will launch on PC, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch on August 15th, 2024.

In Grapple Dogs: Cosmic Canines, players will join Pablo and Luna, an intrepid duo of pups, as they swing, bounce, and blast their way through interdimensional landscapes on a mission to save the cosmos! Prepare for action-packed levels, challenging puzzles, and adorable canine capers in this vibrant and unforgettable adventure
